pli-tv-pvr2.16:1.3: Avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ gahaṇaṃ sādiyati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.16:1.4: bhikkhu kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.16:1.8: kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyanapaccayā imā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati. #1
pli-tv-pvr2.16:2.1: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.16:2.6: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.16:2.9: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā saṃghādisesāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā pācittiyāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena.
pli-tv-pvr2.16:2.11: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr2.16:2.14: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca …pe…. #2
pli-tv-pvr2.16:3.1: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.16:3.2: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.16:3.5: dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā imā dve āpattiyo āpajjati. #1
pli-tv-pvr2.16:4.1: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.16:4.6: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ ekaṃ vipattiṃ bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.16:4.11: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhanti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.16:4.12: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhanti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.16:4.13: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr2.16:4.14: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.
pli-tv-pvr2.16:4.17: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena cāti. #2
